DataElement.preferredName: Colon Tumor Distance Anal Verge Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether or not the patient's lowest lying colon tumor is greater than or equal to 12 centimeters from the anal verge.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient's tumor and proximity to the anal verge.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An abnormal tissue growth resulted from uncontrolled cell proliferation.  Benign neoplastic cells resemble normal cells without exhibiting significant cytologic atypia, while malignant ones exhibit overt signs such as dysplastic features, atypical mitotic figures, necrosis, nuclear pleomorphism, and anaplasia.  Representative examples of benign neoplasms include papillomas, cystadenomas, and lipomas; malignant neoplasms include carcinomas, sarcomas, lymphomas, and leukemias. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A benign or malignant tissue growth resulting from uncontrolled cell proliferation. Benign neoplastic cells resemble normal cells without exhibiting significant cytologic atypia, while malignant cells exhibit overt signs such as dysplastic features, atypical mitotic figures, necrosis, nuclear pleomorphism, and anaplasia. Representative examples of benign neoplasms include papillomas, cystadenomas, and lipomas; malignant neoplasms include carcinomas, sarcomas, lymphomas, and leukemias.

Property.preferredDefinition: The transitional zone between the moist, hairless, modified skin of the anal canal and the perianal skin. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The transitional zone between the moist, hairless, modified skin of the anal canal and the perianal skin.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the distal extent of the l
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the distal extent of the lowest lying colon tumor greater or equal to 12 cm from the anal verge?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the majority of the untreated tumor below the peritoneal reflection as determined by the treating surgeon

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If yes,  is the distal extent of the tumor equal or greater than 12 cm from the anal verge?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the distal extent of the tumor greater than or equal to 12 cm from the anal verge on colonoscopy or above the peritoneal reflection as documented during surgery or on pathology specimen (i.e., excluding rectal adenocarcinomas warranting treatment with chemoradiation)?
